devdoc.details: A smart contract for managing a supply chain system.

addParticipant(string,string,address,str.details: Function to add a participant to the supply chain.

params._pAdd: The Ethereum address of the participant.
params._pType: The type of participant (e.g., Manufacturer, Supplier, Consumer).

returns._0: The ID of the newly added participant.

addProduct(uint32,string,string,string,u.details: Function to add a product to the supply chain.

params._modelNumber: The model number of the product.
params._ownerId: The ID of the participant who is the owner of the product.
params._partNumber: The part number of the product.
params._serialNumber: The serial number of the product.

returns._0: The ID of the newly added product.
A boolean indicating whether the participant is authenticated.
The product ID, owner ID, owner address, and timestamp of the ownership.
The username, Ethereum address, and participant type of the participant.
The model number, part number, serial number, cost, owner address, and manufacturing timestamp of the product.

getProvenance(uint32).details: Function to retrieve the product track (ownership history) of a product.

returns._0: An array of ownership IDs representing the product track.

newOwner(uint32,uint32,uint32).details: Function to transfer ownership of a product to a new participant.

params._prodId: The ID of the product to transfer ownership.
params._user1Id: The ID of the current owner of the product.
params._user2Id: The ID of the new owner of the product.

returns._0: A boolean indicating whether the ownership transfer was successful.

ownerships.details: Mapping to store ownerships and product track.

devdoc.title: SupplyChain
